name: Publicity Training, Publishing Services
what_you_do: Get featured in newspapers and magazines, providing clients with the opportunity to showcase their work and gain visibility through print media.
who_you_serve: Individuals and businesses looking to enhance their public image and gain exposure through media features.
current_projects: Opportunity to be featured in luxury issues and on NYC Times Square billboard.
bio: Featured in major publications like the Los Angeles Tribune and NYC Independent, with access to a database of over 110,000 people.
business_focus: Get featured in newspapers and magazines, providing clients with the opportunity to showcase their work and gain visibility through print media. (publicity training)
